title: Through the Lens
description: She was my first love.He was my first everythingCircumstances stole her from me.Circumstances made him abandon me.But the past is the past. And we are no longer kids.Cora Davies is the one that got away. The one I wanted to keep forever.Life threw a wrench in our plan. Tore us apart. Shattered our hearts.Gavin Hunt is the one I handed my heart to. The one person I saw a future with.Until it was ripped away. Crushed. Scattered in the wind.Now... fate is giving us another chance. To live the life we once dreamt of.Unfortunately, not everyone believes our reunion is for the best.
author: Persephone Autumn
